comment_regular_data.body: --- Reviewed 13 of 13 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/296#-:-KXwYjW_qXL02WchVV7e:b-jbsf8z)*

--- Reviewed 13 of 13 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/296#-:-KY0MjfuHSpAGFTDRjR7:bg7igkv)*

--- Reviewed 13 of 13 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/296#-:-KY1CUrUxNTDI6RR1f6Q:bg7igkv)*

Ok, I took a closer look at this PR and I can say that the way you disable LAN discovery is not the proper way. LAN discovery is used exclusively by `friend_connection.h`, which is used exclusively by `Messenger.c`. You shouldn't touch DHT at all, it's not involved in LAN discovery. You shouldn't even store that option in the DHT. The Messenger should pass it into `new_friend_connections()` inside `new_messenger()` function, and `new_friend_connections()` should store it in `Friend_Connections` struct.

commit.message: Add option to disable local peer discovery
